zones.name: Fallbrook Town Ruins
zones.description: The dilapidated urban sprawl of what was once Fallbrook. Dangerous, with pockets of activity.

zones.name: Sunrise Project Outskirts
zones.description: Barren, irradiated plains surrounding the hidden Sunrise Project Lab. Few travel here willingly.

zones.name: Sunrise Project Lab
zones.description: The secret underground facility. Automated defenses and strange creatures are rumored to be within.

zones.name: De Luz Road Territory
zones.description: Rough terrain controlled by the Followers of Apocalypse's Kindle (FOAK).

zones.name: Calaveras Caves Region
zones.description: A network of caves and canyons, lair of the Calaveras de la Muerte.

zones.name: Camp Pendleton Ruins
zones.description: The sprawling, hazardous ruins of a major military base. Now home to various factions and dangers.

zones.name: FRN Bunker Zone
zones.description: A fortified zone containing Fallbrook Republic Network science bunkers.
